remarks: The mapping of a permutation of a set fixing an element to a permutation of the set without the fixed element is a function.  (Contributed by AV, 4-Jan-2019.)
statement:
symgfixf.p $e |- P = ( Base ` ( SymGrp ` N ) ) $.
symgfixf.q $e |- Q = { q e. P | ( q ` K ) = K } $.
symgfixf.s $e |- S = ( Base ` ( SymGrp ` ( N \ { K } ) ) ) $.
symgfixf.h $e |- H = ( q e. Q |-> ( q |` ( N \ { K } ) ) ) $.
symgfixf $p |- ( K e. N -> H : Q --> S ) $.
$d K q $.
$d N q $.
$d P q $.
$d Q q $.
$d S q $.
